comment.author: 36899742@N00
comment._content: The date on the stamp in the upper left corner appears to say 12/23/13, but that makes no sense as Roosevelt was on an expedition in South America at that time. The date in the margin (also in the stamp at the upper right) says 6/3/12 #2, and that makes a lot more sense. Roosevelt was still actively campaigning for president then.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the observation and the information. Will submit for review and possible update to the catalog record.

comment.author: 37167805@N00
comment._content: "...and then I said to the Kaiser, 'You didn't come here to hunt, did you?'"
